mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Narrative Report of Ebensburg Center Draft

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A draft of the narrative report for a visit to Ebensburg Center by ACC-PARC and PARC members. Members visited Buildings 3, 4, and 6 observing and commenting on physical surroundings, food service, clothing, resident appearance, programming, medical care, staff attitude, and rights of residents.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: II. State School and Hospital (SSH) and Interim Care Committee Records 1972-1997
4. State Schools and Hospitals (SSH) and Interim Care Facilities 1972-1984
Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
